sources.title: The Black Watch (1929) JOHN FORDüçï VICTOR McLAGLENüçï MYRNA LOY
sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX 
Director: JOHN FORD
Stars: Victor McLaglen, Myrna Loy, David Torrence
üçïNEW STUNNING HD PRESENTATIONüçï
The legendary John Ford breaks the sound barrier with his very first all-talking film‚Äîa stirring tale of duty, honor, and redemption. 

This pre-Code adventure epic features Victor McLaglen in a powerful performance as a British officer torn between honor and duty during World War I. Co-starring the mesmerizing Myrna Loy as a mysterious rebel princess, this Fox Film production brings to life a gripping tale of espionage, sacrifice, and misunderstood heroism.

Set against the exotic backdrop of British India, this Movietone classic showcases Ford‚Äôs early mastery of sound filmmaking. Fans of classic cinema will enjoy rare early blink-and-you'll-miss'em appearances by screen icons John Wayne and Randolph Scott. Rediscover this hidden gem from Hollywood's dawn of sound, brought to you by PizzaFLIX, your home for classic films, vintage cinema, and forgotten treasures.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

Perfect for fans of John Ford films, pre-Code Hollywood, British military dramas, and early sound films. Don‚Äôt miss this must-see piece of film history!

metadata.Plot: Captain Donald King of the British Army goes to India just as World War I breaks out, convincing his comrades that he is a coward. In reality, he is on a secret mission to rescue British soldiers held prisoner there.
metadata.Writer: James Kevin McGuinness, Talbot Mundy, John Stone
metadata.Actors: Victor McLaglen, Myrna Loy, David Torrence
